Html:
Hi,
love your plugin, great work.
I was wondering though, if there is any way to change the width of a star to percentages of the parent element. For example: 40% for 2 stars (if you have 5 in total).
This would be great for building a solid responsive design.
Thx alot :)
andrej

Hi Andrej,

I'm looking into the whole issue of icon fonts and responsive design. It is possible to do it with the current version but it is pretty cumbersome.

I'll be on vacation till the end of the month. Once I come back I'll start working on it.

Gidon

I would be glad to support your effort.

I am about to build a solution and I am half way there for a 5-star rating.

Is there any way to commit or share some code at codeplex? I only use github, so I don't have any experience with codeplex.

Cheers,

andrej
